Title: Hardwired
Plot: After Eva Banks (guest star Rosie Perez) makes a shocking discovery about her son, Cory's (guest star Cruz Santiago) behavior at school, she takes him to the doctor, only to find out that he has been the victim of sexual abuse. Detectives Benson and Stabler come onto the scene and question the victim and his family. From the boy?s frightened reaction when his stepfather, Thomas Banks (guest star Jim True-Frost), silences the investigation, it is clear to everyone in the room who the real perpetr
ParentalRatingReason: Violence, sexual themes and content that may disturb
GuestStars: Stephanie March, Jeri Ryan, Rosie Perez, Garret Dillahunt, Jim True-Frost, Mitchell Jarvis
